src.data.predict.predict

Helper functions for building features to make predictions on.

src.data.predict.predict.build_prediction_data(upcoming, features_path)[source]

Build the data to make predictions on.

Parameters:

  • upcoming – pd.DataFrame of shape (n_games, n_cols) Upcoming games from the raw games df.

  • features_path – str Path to features data.

Returns:

pd.DataFrame of shape (n_games, n_cols) Data to make predictions on.

src.data.predict.predict.get_most_recent_dir(path)[source]

Get the largest dir name.

Parameters:

path – str Path to directory.

Returns:

str Path to most recent results dir.

src.data.predict.predict.merge_most_recent_feature(games, feature, current_season, current_week)[source]

Merge the most recent feature to the games df.

Parameters:

  • games – pd.DataFrame of shape (n_games, n_cols) Raw games df.

  • feature – pd.DataFrame of shape (n_weeks, n_cols) Feature df. Index should be either game_id or (season, team, week).

  • current_season – int Current season.

  • current_week – int Current week.

Returns:

pd.DataFrame of shape (n_games, n_cols) Games df with feature merged.
